page.title: 09The Bull Family
page.content: My Dad's lifestyle early in the morning never changes.From Monday to Friday he leaves for work at 7.30a.m to travel to Harefield in Middlesex. I get woken up at 6.30a.m by my sister's radio.She leaves for work at 8.00a.m to travel to Aylesbury.I leave for school at 8.45a.m. My friend Stephen picks me up in the car.My school is in Weston Turville. During the week my Mum travels into Aylesbury to shop.I arrive home by 4.15p.m. By this time Mum is making the tea.My sister arrives home from work at 5.30p.m followed by my Dad at 7.30p.m. For the rest of the evening we sit down to watch television and chat.Some nights we go out for a drink.On a Tuesday and Saturday evening my Dad takes my sister out in her car to practice for her driving test.
